extension.description: This plugin is used to send reminder emails to registrants of your events

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: number_registrants
field.label: Number Registrants
field.description: Number of registrants which we will send reminder each time the plugin run

field.name: send_to_group_billing
field.label: Send to group billing
field.description: If set to Yes, the group billing person of group registration will receive reminder emails

field.name: send_to_group_members
field.label: Send to group members
field.description: If set to Yes, group members of a group registration will receive reminder emails

field.name: send_to_unpublished_events
field.label: Send to unpublished events
field.description: If set to Yes, reminder emails will be sent to registrants of unpublish events

field.name: only_send_to_paid_registrants
field.label: Only send to paid registrants
field.description: If set to Yes, reminder emails will only be sent to registrants with Registration Status Paid. Registrants with Pending Status (don't make payment) won't receive reminder emails

field.name: only_send_to_checked_in_registrants
field.label: Only send to checked in registrants
field.description: If set to Yes, reminder emails will only be sent to checked in registrants. In this case, none checked-in registrants won't receive reminder email

field.name: bcc_email
field.label: BCC Email
field.description: If you want to receive a copy of reminder email so that you can keep track of reminder, enter the email you want here

field.name: trigger_reminder_code
field.label: Trigger Reminder Code (Leave empty unless you are using cron job to send reminder)
field.description: Enter a secret string here if you want to use cron job to trigger sending reminder. Refer to our documentation for more details

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug
field.description: In case set to Yes, the reminder emails will be checked and sent on every page load, for debug purpose only
